TEXT.TITLE: CYCARE <CYCR.O> BUYS CONTROL DATA <CAD> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Cycare Systems Inc, an information processing systems company, said it purchased the assets of Control Data Corp's MedTec unit for undisclosed terms. MedTec is a provider of patient accounting and scheduling systems for large scale group medical practices. Reuter
